p.d: Ã‰tienne, Virginie, Sylvain, Fabrice... Having drunk heavily for years they have finally emerged from the hell of alcohol, isolation, lies, self-destruction... Together they are trying to rebuild a life free from alcohol and speak out in the group run by Laurence Cottet, a former patient now a specialist in addiction. Directed by: Marie Agostini (France, 2016)
